title: COVID-19 Карта Взаимопомощи
info: Чтобы помочь людям найти и присоединиться к организациям по оказанию взаимопомощи там, где они живут, вдохновить открыть собственную и/или просто поднять дух, ниже представлен растущий список проектов по оказанию взаимопомощи при пандемических катастрофах. Примечание: каждый проект автономен и самоорганизован; многие используют публичные таблицы для обмена информацией, поэтому будьте осторожны при вводе персональной информации, если вы не хотите чтобы она оказалась в публичном доступе.
about: Эта карта часть {reach4Help} проекта осуществляемого добровольцами. Код находится в общем доступе {githubSource}. Если у вас есть вопросы или предложения, пишите на.

information.acceptedInformation: At the moment, we are only putting information about organizations or companies providing aid and assistance, region-specifric financial assistance initiatives, and mutual aid groups. We are not accepting information about individuals offering aid at this time.
information.intro: Please fill out the form below to begin adding information, we will ask you for location and contact details after that.

form.type: Type of project / group / organization / initiative
form.services: Services or support that this organization / company provides
form.name: Name of the project / group / organization
form.description: (optional) Detailed description of the project / group / organization, and what it aims to do to facilitate mutual-aid
form.locationName: Describe the geographic area served. E.g. Countries, states, counties, towns etc...
form.locationNamePlaceholder: E.g: San Francisco Bay Area, CA, USA
form.continue: Click continue to enter location information

placeMarker.instructions: Locate the area served by this project / group / organization / initiative by clicking on the map to place a marker, then adjust the size of the circle to encompass the area as required.
placeMarker.continue: Once you are happy with the location, click continue to proceed with adding contact information.

contactInfo.info: Almost there! Please enter information on how people can contact {name}. If there are specific contact methods that should be used to volunteer to help, or to request help, please enter those!

addInfo.getHelp: Add contact information for people that need help

sections.getHelp: Contact info for people that need help

submitted.successExtra: Before we make your information visible on the map, it will need to be reviewed by a volunteer on our team. This should hopefully be done within a couple of days.

errors.missingType: Please select the type of the project / group / organization
errors.missingServices: Please check all services supplied by this organization (at least 1 is required)
errors.missingTitle: Please enter the name of the project / group / organization
errors.missingLocationName: Please enter a description of the area served
errors.markerRequired: Please click on the map to enter the service area before continuing.
errors.noContactDetails: Please enter contact details for at least one category
errors.emptyContactSection: Please enter some contact information for {section} or delete it
errors.urlMissingLabel: A URL for {section} is missing a Name
errors.urlMissingURL: A URL entry for {section} is missing the URL
errors.dataError: There was a problem with the information you submitted, please go back and try again
errors.submitError: There was a problem submitting your information: {error}. Please try again later

serviceDescriptions.supplies: Supplies other than food or medicine
serviceDescriptions.mobility: Transporting people from one location to another
serviceDescriptions.support: Support tailored for specific vulnerable groups, e.g. homeless people, people at risk from domestic abuse, etc...
serviceDescriptions.network: Prodicing resources for networking to provide aid, e.g. between mutual aid organizations
serviceDescriptions.manufacturing: Provides supplies or manufacturing capacity needed to deal with the crisis
serviceDescriptions.other: Something else not on this list
